org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.testcases

Class BenchmarksRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.testcases.BenchmarksRunner

  • public class BenchmarksRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    a class which, given a schema and a list of benchmarks to run, runs each of them and returns the results in a hashmap having the spec.reportName as a key. Each report is run multiple times and the best result is reported (thus this class is good for CPU-bottlenecked schemas / reports only)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BenchmarksRunner.BenchmarkResult
      the result of running a single test.

    • Field Summary

      the number of times to run each report

      • runBenchmark

        protected BenchmarksRunner.BenchmarkResult runBenchmark(ReportSpecification spec,
                                                        BenchmarksRunner.BenchmarkResult corOutput)
        runs a specific report and returns an estimate of its performance. The estimate is the best result over runs runs
        Parameters:
        spec -
        corOutput - - the cor output to take into account. The function will throw an exception in case the non-timing fields are set and disagree with what comes out of the reports engine
        Returns:

      • doRun

        protected BenchmarksRunner.BenchmarkResult doRun(java.lang.String runName,
                                                 ReportSpecification spec,
                                                 BenchmarksRunner.BenchmarkResult corOutput,
                                                 int runNumber)
        runs a given report a single time and returns the metrics (timings, digests, counts) of it. Crashes in case that a cor is supplied and any of its set values disagrees with what came out of the reports engine
        Parameters:
        runName -
        spec -
        corOutput -
        runNumber -
        Returns:

      • formatOutput

        protected ReportArea formatOutput(ReportSpecification spec,
                                  NiReportRunResult reportRes)
        formats the NiReports API output to Reports API output. The output per se is not used, but the process is benchmarked against regressions
        Parameters:
        spec -
        reportRes -
        Returns:
